contents.translated: Charizard flies 'round the sky in search of powerful opponents. 't breathes fire of such most wondrous heatthat 't melts aught. However,  't nev'r turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
contents.text: CHARIZARD flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents. It breathes fire of such great heatthat it melts anything. However, it never turns its fiery breath on any opponent weaker than itself.
